column1: Local Foods////I've never been to a sandwich shop quite like this one. I'm not from Texas
column2: so my friend was taking me to all the good local places and this place is by far one of my favorites. I got the crispy chicken sandwich with a side of tabouli and kale. SO. TASTY. The sandwich can get messy
column3: but it was totally worth it. And thank goodness we missed the lunch rush. If I ever go back to Texas
column4: I will definitely go back and try some of their other sandwiches!
